仰.definition: to face upward; to look up; to admire; to rely on

仰人鼻息.definition: to rely on others for the air one breathes (idiom); to depend on sb's whim for one's living

仰仗.definition: to rely on; to depend on

仰光.definition: Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006

仰天.definition: to face upwards; to look up to the sky

仰屋.definition: to lie looking at the ceiling (in despair)

仰屋興嘆.definition: to stare at the ceiling in despair; to find no way out; nothing you can do about it; at the end of one's wits

仰屋著書.definition: lit. to stare at the ceiling while writing a book (idiom); to put one's whole body and soul into a book

仰望.definition: to look up at; to look up to sb hopefully

仰視.definition: to tilt one's head back to see (sth); to look up at

仰韶.definition: Yangshao culture (archaeological period with red and black pottery)

仰韶文化.definition: Yangshao neolithic culture from the central Yellow river basin, with red and black pottery
